name: Pocketeer
description:
Voted No.1 Adventuring Essential Magic Item across the multiverse!

As a Bag Goblin, you have been assigned to the astral bag of a dungeon crawling adventurer!

Your job is to manage the space inside the bag by organizing, growing and shrinking items, as well as finding an delivering requested items from storage. 

Store whatever you want, whenever you want - your goblin never sleeps!

Your score is based on the efficiency in which you perform your task, keeping the bag light and fulfilling requests in a timely manner.

Your goblin is an expert in manipulating scale - the only thing he loves more than being tidy, is having a lot of things to tidy! Not a single one of your precious items is too big or too awkward - your Goblin will make it fit

Developed by Evelyn Schwab and Damian Scott
